name: Meowventure
description:
Welcome to Meowventure, a short 2D point-and-click adventure game! Play as the female cat, Cupcake, as she journeys through the forest to find her daughter, Clementine, while her husband, Connor, is asleep on a tree!

Controls ESCOpens and Closes the MenuIOpens and Closes the InventoryLeft Mouse ClickWalk, Interact with Items, Continue Text, etc.
Right Mouse ClickInspect Specific Items in the Inventory Credits
  • Most of the graphic elements and half of the music and sounds come from https://www.glitchthegame.com/
  • The other half of the music and sounds comes from uploaded files with CC0 licenses in https://freesound.org/
  • Some graphic elements are parts of asset packs from https://kenney.nl/
  • Made with Unity Personal Edition and Adventure Creator
